title: Lanka IOC increases fuel prices again
content: Lanka Indian Oil Company has increased all categories of Diesel by Rs 15 per Litre and Petrol by Rs 20 per Litre with effect from midnight today.This the 2nd fuel price revision by Lanka IOC this month.State-run Ceylon Petroleum Corporation has not increased prices.IOC New Price : Petrol 92-Octane 204 rupee a litre, Desel 139 rupee a litre.
